name: Citywest Hotel, Conference & Event Centre

reviews.text: As this place was convenient to where i wanted to be the next morning as serves dinner until 11 i choose here despite the reviews. The service was good and the breakfast was above average. The room was spacious aswell. This is a good business hotel
reviews.title: a lot better than the reviews suggested

reviews.text: We booked to stay in this hotel for 2 nights in conjunction with the Darts Grand Prix. I have to admit I was more than worried about the accommodation after reading the reviews on this site. When we checked in, like others we were told we were staying in the Golf Hotel down the lane, this pleased me somewhat as I reckoned there would be lots of noise etc in the main hotel from the crowds staying over. The reception staff were not at all helpful and were very rude but we were expecting this behavior from the reviews so didn't surprise us!! We got to our room and were impressed at the sheer size and cleanliness of the room & bathroom. We have no complaints what so ever about the room and the beds are soooo comfortable I wanted to take it home!!! The only other downside to the hotel was the que for breakfast in the morning and I would put that down to the sheer volume of people staying over on this particular weekend. We ate in the Lemongrass Restuarant which was top class and very friendly and efficient staff. I would love to stay in this hotel again on a weekend that wasn't so busy because it has alot to offer and the grounds are amazing. We didn't find it particularly cheap by any means but it was sheer convenience for us to stay here.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed here in August with my son who is a wheelchair user and we have travelled and stayed in plenty of hotel to compair. Service and attention from staff was the worst ever experienced. At check in I was never offered porter service so was left struggle up to the 5th floor with my 8yr old son in his wheelchair and a bag that had two days worth of clothes ect in(not a small bag). Walked past two porters who did not notice. Room was big and spacious but air conditioning did not work and the tv was stuck on channel 4. No movies channels in the hotel so my son and I went to bed at 9pm!!!!!! Dinner in the Bistro was a disaster, service bad I had to ask the waiter 3 times for a wine list. My son had a pizza which he did not like so did not eat, when the staff came to clear away the waiter commented on my son not eating his pizza and when I said he did not like it, he never even offered to get him a slice of toast - nothing. Not the service I expect in a 4* hotel. After this we did not eat again in the hotel, we went to Bewleys hotel (about 7mins drive) for breakfast both mornings. On the second night the tv nor the air conditioning was repaired. When on check out I asked for the managers name to write to him the two reception girls had to ask another staff member in the office for his name. I wrote to the manager expressing my dissapointment and as yet have not recieved a reply. Obviously not only do the staff not care about the customer. I will not return and would not recommend. Making a complaint to this hotel falls on deaf ears. I did try to book out after the first night but as there was a GAA game on the same weekend I could not get any decent accommodation.
reviews.title: Worst service ever
